description: Dashboard per la visualizzazione di varie tipologie di sensori dislocati in una citt√†

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
    'Termometro' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.temperatures
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
    'Igrometro' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.umidities
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
     argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
    'Colonnina di ricarica' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.chargingStations
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
    argMax(cella, timestamp) as cella_sensore,
    'Isola ecologica' as Tipo,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.ecoIslands
GROUP BY ID_sensore
HAVING cella_sensore IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    ID_sensore,
    value,
    timestamp
FROM
    innovacity.temperatures
WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )

SELECT
  avg(value) as avgTemperature
FROM innovacity.temperatures
WHERE ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND  cella IN ($Cella)
;

SELECT
  avg(value) as avgUmdity
FROM innovacity.umidities
WHERE ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND cella IN ($Cella);

panels.description: calcola la temperatura media ogni minuto

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ID_sensore,
value,
timestamp
FROM innovacity.umidities
WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )

panels.title: Umidit√†

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    ID_sensore,
    'Colonnina di ricarica' as Tipo,
    last_value(value) AS last_value,
    argMax(latitude, timestamp) AS latitude,
    argMax(longitude, timestamp) AS longitude
FROM innovacity.chargingStations
WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
GROUP BY (ID_sensore);

SELECT
    count(*)
FROM (
    SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        cella,
        last_value(value) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore,cella)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 0 AND cella IN ($Cella);

SELECT
    count(*)
FROM (
    SELECT
        ID_sensore,
        cella,
        last_value(value) AS last_value
    FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )
    GROUP BY (ID_sensore,cella)
) last_values
WHERE last_values.last_value = 1 AND cella IN ($Cella);

SELECT ID_sensore,
value,
timestamp
FROM innovacity.ecoIslands
WHERE cella IN ($Cella) AND ( timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime )

panels.description: Mostra l'ultimo valore dello stato di rimepimento percentuale

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
   
    argMax(value, timestamp) AS last_value,
    ID_sensore
FROM 
    "innovacity"."ecoIslands" 
GROUP BY 
    ID_sensore
HAVING argMax(cella,timestamp) IN ($Cella)

panels.title: Stato riempimento attuale

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT cella
FROM (
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.temperatures
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.umidities
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.ecoIslands
)
list.label: Seleziona cella
list.name: Cella
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT cella
FROM (
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.temperatures
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.umidities
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.chargingStations
    UNION ALL
    SELECT cella FROM innovacity.ecoIslands
)
